newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - FRANCE - LE MONDE MAY 30.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - FRANCE - LE MONDE MAY 30.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- Left and right prepare for possible power sharing in the event of a majority for the Left after Sunday's second round in the parliamentary election.

-- Bouygues , which aims to compete with France Telecom in fixed telecommunications, creates a new company called BS of which 49 percent is earmarked for foreign partners such as Italy's Stet and Germany's Veba, and 51 percent would eventually be available to French partners such as possibly Lyonnaise des Eaux .
